abstract: Returns the drawable type you use to retrieve the textures and drawing environment for the frame.
overview:
## Return Value

The drawable type, or `nil` if the layer is in the [doc://com.apple.compositorservices/documentation/CompositorServices/LayerRenderer/State-swift.enum/paused] or [doc://com.apple.compositorservices/documentation/CompositorServices/LayerRenderer/State-swift.enum/invalidated] state.

## Discussion

Fetch the drawable when you’re ready to encode the drawing commands for the frame. The [doc://com.apple.compositorservices/documentation/CompositorServices/cp_drawable_t] type contains the textures and other information you need to set up your render descriptor in Metal.

# cp_frame_query_drawable

**Function**

Returns the drawable type you use to retrieve the textures and drawing environment for the frame.

## Declaration

```swift
cp_drawable_t cp_frame_query_drawable(cp_frame_t frame);
```

## Parameters

- **frame**: The frame to query.

## Return Value

The drawable type, or `nil` if the layer is in the [doc://com.apple.compositorservices/documentation/CompositorServices/LayerRenderer/State-swift.enum/paused] or [doc://com.apple.compositorservices/documentation/CompositorServices/LayerRenderer/State-swift.enum/invalidated] state.

## Discussion

Fetch the drawable when you’re ready to encode the drawing commands for the frame. The [doc://com.apple.compositorservices/documentation/CompositorServices/cp_drawable_t] type contains the textures and other information you need to set up your render descriptor in Metal.
title: cp_frame_query_drawable
